messages.subject: Sci Fi Film Marathon
messages.msgSnippet: We came back from a really neat weekend. We attended the Boston Science Fiction film Marathon (24 Hours). I took Julian for the second year, and my best friend
messages.messageBody:
We came back from a really neat weekend. We attended the Boston Science
Fiction film Marathon (24 Hours). I took Julian for the second year, and my
best friend Melissa, from CT, took her son Nick. Julian and Nick are best
friends, born 4 days apart. Melissa and I attended the Marathon together
when we were in college, then last year we took the boys. It was fun, some
very cool movies. And Nick will be here with us for the week.

Nick started attending a Sudbury Valley near Hartford this year, and is very
happy with it. We like it because he has more flexibility about visiting us
than when he was in public school, and because Nick is SOOOO happy with his
new school.

Kathryn


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
